data.title: How old was maria torres in trauma team?
data.meta_description:
It's unmentioned in the game, however, an estimate could put her
around 28.
(SPOILERS)
She was about 14 when she started the orphanage fire (as
mentioned Mournful Hero) and that's around the time Rosalia
Rossellini was adopted by Albert Sartre, which also happens to be
the same time CR-S01 was 14 (as mentioned in Stolen Memories). One
can assume that CR and Maria are around the same age.
If Sartre researched Rosalia's blood, it would've taken him
quite a while to coax a virus out of it, so I'd assume that it
would be six years or so before the Cumberland College incident in
2012 (since Trauma Team happened in 2020 and the Cumberland
incident was 8 years before that), meaning 6+8=14, and 14 (Maria's
initial age) + 14 (the years between her initial and final age) =
28, which is pretty much the age she is in Trauma Team. However,
these are all rough estimates, though one can assume she's in her
mid-late-20s.
data.text:
It's unmentioned in the game, however, an estimate could put her around 28.

(SPOILERS)

She was about 14 when she started the orphanage fire (as mentioned Mournful Hero) and that's around the time Rosalia Rossellini was adopted by Albert Sartre, which also happens to be the same time CR-S01 was 14 (as mentioned in Stolen Memories). One can assume that CR and Maria are around the same age.

If Sartre researched Rosalia's blood, it would've taken him quite a while to coax a virus out of it, so I'd assume that it would be six years or so before the Cumberland College incident in 2012 (since Trauma Team happened in 2020 and the Cumberland incident was 8 years before that), meaning 6+8=14, and 14 (Maria's initial age) + 14 (the years between her initial and final age) = 28, which is pretty much the age she is in Trauma Team. However, these are all rough estimates, though one can assume she's in her mid-late-20s.
